title: Coda 2.0.2
description:
Description

A fresh approach to web code. Bursting with features but without bloat. Built to make your life better: Coda 2 is the editor you've always wanted.

So, you code for the web. And in Coda 1, we revolutionized that process, and put everything you needed in one place. An editor. Terminal. CSS. File management. SVN. But we knew we could do more.

Now, with Coda 2, we went beyond expectations. We added tons of highly-requested features, and a few nobody expected, then wrapped it all up in a shiny, groundbreaking UI fit for the future.

This update is, truly, major.

NEW FEATURES:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Visual Tabs. Find files quickly, and see more tabs at once.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customizable Sidebar. Put your favorite, powerful Coda tools in the sidebar dock.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Streamlined Workflow. You'll always know what you're looking at.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Code Focus. Hide the sidebar, or go full-screen, and get work done.

Ã¢Å“â€ Better Text Editing

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Code Folding. Finally.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Smart Complete. Autocomplete your custom variables + functions.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic Indentation
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Smarter Automatic Closing Tags
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tab Key Text-Shifting

Ã¢Å“â€ Better File Management

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Git. In addition to SVN, now you can manage source with GIT.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Complete File Management. FTP, SFTP, WebDAV, and S3, with a Transmit interface.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Transmit Twin-Turbo Engine. Some of the fastest file transfer in the industry.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Path Bar Browsing. Click a path bar segment for an instant file list.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open Quickly. Pop it open, type a few characters, and find what you're looking for.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Group Folders Above Files. A very popular request.

Ã¢Å“â€ Better Clips

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multiple Placeholders. Quickly tab between the bits that need input.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dynamic Placeholders. Automatically fill in dates, URL's, text selections, and more.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Insertion Points. Put the cursor at the right place, every time.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import/Export.

Ã¢Å“â€ Better Sites

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Groups. Drag related sites into a site board.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ List View. See even more sites at a glance.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ iCloud Sites + Clips Sync. Even with Diet Coda on your iPad.

Ã¢Å“â€ Better Design

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Revolutionary CSS Pops. GUI pop-ups help with the hardest CSS as you code.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Live Changes. See your CSS changes affect your page real-time.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ iPad / iPhone Preview. Shrink down your preview to just the right size.

Ã¢Å“â€ Better MySQL

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Built-In MySQL Editor. Without leaving Coda, administer your site's database with ease.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit Structure or Content
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Run Arbitrary Queries
